attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The political shenannegins over the past years on the future of Haslar is a sheer disgrace and an insult to both us people of Gosport, and the worthy staff who work there.  Please once and for all issue the directive that it is to continue serving the area as a first class hospital, and let eveybody know you have done so!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
